org.apache.hcatalog.data
Class LazyHCatRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hcatalog.data.HCatRecord
      org.apache.hcatalog.data.LazyHCatRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, HCatRecordable
public class LazyHCatRecord
extends HCatRecord

An implementation of HCatRecord that wraps an Object returned by a SerDe and an ObjectInspector. This delays deserialization of unused columns.

getWritable

public HCatRecord getWritable()
                       throws HCatException
Convert this LazyHCatRecord to a DefaultHCatRecord. This is required before you can write out a record via write.

Returns:
an HCatRecord that can be serialized
Throws:
HCatException
